title: Guess - Guess 1981 ~ New Fragrances
text: by: Sanja Pekic In the spring of 2017, the fashion house of Guess presents their new pillar fragrance Guess 1981 , announced as the most alluring and the most sensual scent from their collection. Described as sophisticated, elegant and graceful, Guess 1981 promises a strong aroma with crisp and clean top notes, fruity-floral heart and woody-musky base. The top notes of ambrette seed and violet open the composition and make an introduction to the floral-fruity heart of pear, jasmine petals and sandalwood. The base features accord of cedar wood, musk and amber. Top notes: violet, ambrette
